display_long_description:
# Drawing made fun!  Use real paper & pencil!                                      
Become a master artist in no time! Award winning app, **Pencil**, lets you combine mixed reality w/ real paper and pencil to grow your art skills. 

[media]
✏️ - “I have no artistic bone in my body, but this app just taught me how to draw!” - **Tom's Guide**  

✏️ - "The future of mixed reality for hobbies and education!" - **UploadVR** 

[media]

# 🎓Academy Mode!  80+ lessons & counting...
Unlock new lessons & challenges in our **20+ hr Campaign**! Learn drawing concepts of all levels,  for **beginner and advanced artists** alike!
[media]

#  ✏️Free Draw Mode! Create your own still-life scene
Use our library of high-quality 3D models to create your own still life scene! 
[media]

# 📥 Import your own images! Create murals & more!
Add your own images to trace along! You can scale and position your stencil to create **street art, murals, paintings** & more!
[media]

[media]
Join our **Discord** to share your art with the community and give us feedback: https://discord.gg/GpabPFTzDy
